title: Man pleads guilty to Mass. kidnapping, Vermont murder from the 1980s
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime David Morrison, 65, of Vacaville, California, is currently serving a life sentence with the possibility of parole after 25 years in California for other charges.
David Morrison Handout ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A California man pleaded guilty to a 1981 Massachusetts kidnapping and a a 1986 Vermont murder on Tuesday.

title: MBTA police issue plea for cold case info 17 years after teen’s murder
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The 16-year-old from Roxbury was murdered on New Year’s Eve in 2008 while on a bus in Dorchester, police said.
Devonte Franklin was 16 years old when he was murdered on an MBTA bus in 2008.
MBTA Transit Police Seventeen years after Devonté Franklin, a 16-year-old boy from Roxbury, was murdered on an MBTA bus in Dorchester, police are still searching for his killer.

title: Jeremy Swayman: It ‘doesn’t feel like’ Bruins are playing without a captain this year
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "I feel like we have so many leaders in that room that are so capable, and it's allowed voices to be heard that necessarily wouldn't be heard.
" Jeremy Swayman has no issue with the lack of a captain on Boston's roster.

John Tlumacki/The Boston Globe For all of the legitimate concerns regarding a retooled roster and whether or not the Bruins’ depth chart had the horses in place to be a competitive club this year, Boston has largely punched above their weight class this fall.
